name: destination
description: Represents a BACnet Destination, which defines the conditions and recipient for event notifications in BACnet alarm and event systems.

fields.name: valid-days
fields.description: Specifies the days of the week when notifications are valid.

fields.name: from-time
fields.description: The start time of the period during which notifications may be sent.

fields.name: to-time
fields.description: The end time of the period during which notifications may be sent.

fields.name: recipient
fields.description: The recipient of the notification, which may be a device or an address.

fields.name: process-identifier
fields.description: The process identifier for the recipient, used to distinguish between multiple processes on the same device.

fields.name: issue-confirmed-notifications
fields.description: Indicates whether confirmed notifications should be issued (true) or unconfirmed (false).

fields.name: transitions
fields.description: Specifies which event transitions (to-offnormal, to-fault, to-normal) will trigger notifications.
